sect1.title: NetBSD Ports
sect1.para: NetBSD/mac68k is binary compatible with all the NetBSD/m68k OSes. This includes the hp300, amiga, sun3, and atari. What this means is that the rather substantial NetBSD-Amiga archives are available for NetBSD/mac68k use as well.
However, this does not apply to binaries that depend on the local hardware's implementation.
